name: @pod-flow/pods
description: Package for handling pod generation from game data and related scripts

scripts.initialize-game-data: pnpm run fetch-item-types && pnpm run fetch-base-solar-systems
scripts.update-game-data: pnpm run update-and-fetch && pnpm run fetch-killmails
scripts.generate-all-pods: pnpm run generate-killmail-pods && pnpm run generate-item-type-pods && pnpm run generate-smart-assembly-pods && pnpm run generate-solar-system-pods
